titleStmt.title: A treatise of the cohabitacyon of the faithfull with the vnfaithfull Whereunto is added. A sermon made of the confessing of Christe and his gospell, and of the denyinge of the same.
titleStmt.author: Vermigli, Pietro Martire, 1499-1562.
Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575. aut

notesStmt.note: The sermon is by Heinrich Bullinger, whose initials appear on I2r. It was possibly translated by Becon; original text not traced.
